name: Bravo Sample: Multi-User Like Button
description:
Made for Bravo Studio.


Add like buttons in your Bravo app for multiple users with this sample Figma file.

The file includes layers named with Bravo Tags, containers, and other essential setup. 🤓


To build the final result, create a project in Bravo Studio with this Figma file, connect your backend (we recommend Xano) and preview with Bravo Vision. 🚀


Learn more about setting up the like button & custom authentication in the Bravo Studio help center.


Check out Bravo Studio 👏

www.bravostudio.app
